channel.title: OAuth and OIDC :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: OAuth and OIDC explained Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 147 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect overview: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/oauth-openid/ Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview Conceptual overviews present a high-level introduction to a topic. Such high-level overviews provide developers with a broad understanding of the system’s workings.

item.title: Flows (grant types)
item.description: Flows (grant types) Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 505 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Page type: Navigation Content type: Autogenerated Index An autogenerated index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering. A blind list of summaries and links to child docs.

item.title: Authorization servers
item.description: Authorization servers Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 161 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: no changes needed to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Links to original docs: Authorization servers: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/auth-servers/ Why is this here?: Group results showed authorization server is a “no consensus” term, which may indicate term confusion and/or differing interpretations by respondents. Page type: Concept

item.title: Access, ID, and refresh tokens
item.description: Access, ID, and refresh tokens Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 167 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Overview of Access, Id and refresh tokens. Links to original docs: Some content for the new doc originating from: Refresh access tokens: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/refresh-tokens/main/ Possible Access and ID token content is in other docs as well Page type: Concept

item.title: JSON Web Tokens (JWTs)
item.description: JSON web tokens Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 230 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: Overview of JSON web tokens. Why is this here?: External Oktane 2023 - MatchIt: 21% of respondents got JWTs incorrect in the MatchIt exercise. External Oktane 2023 - GroupIt: 9.3% were unable to categorize JSON web token Respondents placed JSON web tokens under the broad APIs and SDKs group at 48.

item.title: Identity Providers
item.description: Identity Providers Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 784 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: This is a new doc defining what an identity provider is how Okta acts as one what an external identity provider is, and how an app and Okta interact with them (in overview - not very much detail - this is covered in Build > Federate Identities).
